00019 #ifndef SP_GL_QUAD_H
00020 #define SP_GL_QUAD_H
00021 
00022 #include "SpGlHeaders.h"
00023 
00024 
00025 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027 namespace Spark:
00028 {
00029 
00030 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 class SpQuadSg
00034 {
00035 
00037 public:
00038 
00039     inline SpQuadSg(
00040         float fMinX = 0.0f, float fMinY = 0.0f,
00041         float fMaxX = 1.0f, float fMaxY = 1.0f, float fZ=0.5f)
00042     ) :
00043         m_fMinX(fMinX), m_fMinY(fMinY),
00044         m_fMaxX(fMaxX), m_fMaxY(fMaxY), m_fZ(fZ)
00045     {
00046         // EMPTY!
00047     }
00048 
00049     inline virtual ~SpQuadSg()
00050     {
00051         // EMPTY!
00052     }
00053 
00054 
00056 public:
00057 
00058     inline void render()
00059     {
00060         glNormal3f(m_fMinX, m_fMinY, 1.0f);
00061         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00062         {
00063             glVertex3f(m_fMinX, m_fMinY, m_fZ);
00064             glVertex3f(m_fMaxX, m_fMinY, m_fZ);
00065             glVertex3f(m_fMaxX, m_fMaxY, m_fZ);
00066             glVertex3f(m_fMinX, m_fMaxY, m_fZ);
00067         }
00068         glEnd();
00069     }
00070 
00071     inline void setVertexCoordRect(
00072         float fMinX, float fMinY, float fMaxX,
00073         float fMaxY, float fZ = 0.5f)
00074     {
00075         m_fMinX = fMinX; m_fMaxX = fMaxX;
00076         m_fMinY = fMinY; m_fMaxY = fMaxY;
00077         m_fZ = fZ;
00078     }
00079 
00080 protected:
00081 
00082     float m_fMinX;
00083     float m_fMinY;
00084     float m_fMaxX;
00085     float m_fMaxY;
00086 
00087     float m_fZ;
00088 };
00089

00091 
00092 }   // end namespace: Spark
